Amazon ’ s $2. 75 billion investment in AI startup Anthropic this week is its largest venture deal on record. “They de � nitely don ’t want to miss out on being part of the AI ecosystem, ” said Fred Havemeyer , head of U .S. AI and software research at Macquarie , in regards to the overall surge in investment.
